attributes.action: banish Keith Vas MP from the House of Commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given Keith Vas' recent indulgence with tax payer’s cash, we urge the Prime Minister to banish him from the House of Commons until he has proven himself worthy of representing his constituency.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
